about_the_game:
Previously exclusive to backers of the Kickstarter, these items are now available in this DLC! Get access to all the appearance-related backer items and backer weapons that were never released publicly! This is a small bundle intended to help support the developers of Aground (like the original Kickstarter backers).

This DLC includes:

  • 3 new hair styles
  • 4 new facial hair styles
  • 2 new weapons
  • 6 new colorable clothes
  • 2 new colorable hats
  • 5 new uncolorable hats
  • Improved appearance of previously released backer weapons

The core Aground game is a complete experience on its own, but if you really love this game, want to support it, and want to make sure you have every item ever released for it, then this is the DLC for you!

NOTE: this does NOT include the web-specials (extra content added for the Newgrounds, Kongregate and Armor Games versions), but those were released for free and can be added from the Steam Workshop.

The core Aground game is a complete experience on its own, but if you really love this game, want to support it, and want to make sure you have every item ever released for it, then this is the DLC for you!

NOTE: this does NOT include the web-specials (extra content added for the Newgrounds, Kongregate and Armor Games versions), but those were released for free and can be added from the Steam Workshop.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 with ARB or EXT Framebuffer Objects
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.9 Mavericks
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 with ARB or EXT Framebuffer Objects
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Aground - Backer Items

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 with ARB or EXT Framebuffer Objects
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: If you want to support Aground and make sure you have every item ever released for it, then this is the DLC for you. This DLC includes every backer exclusive item in one package.
